itemInfo.itemDesc:
The flavors of Calpheon put into one dish.
- Unique effect: For 110 min:
 All Damage Reduction +5
 Max HP +100
 HP Recovery +5
- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

item.name: Milk Tea
item.desc:
A fragrant tea with milk in it. 

- Unique Effect: Combat EXP Increase +8% for 90 min
HP Recovery +5 for 90 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Milk Tea
item.desc:

HP Recovery +5 for 90 min

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Cheese Pie
item.desc:
A grain dough baked with cheese inside. 

- Unique Effect: Restore +7 Worker Stamina (Use through the Worker Menu on the world map)

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 1 sec

item.name: Meat Pasta
item.desc:
A pasta with meat sauce. 

- Unique Effect: Weight Limit +40LT for 60 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Soft Bread
item.desc:
A grain dough that was allowed to ferment before baking. 

- Unique Effect: Max Stamina +100 for 30 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Fish Filet Salad
item.desc:
Fresh salad with uncooked fish meat. 
- Unique effect: Movement Speed Rank +1 for 60 min.
- How to Obtain : Can be cooked at your residence.
- Cooldown : 30min

item.name: Smooth Milk Tea
item.desc:
The finest milk tea that can be made. 

- Unique Effect: Combat EXP Increase +8% for 110 min
 HP Recovery +5 for 110 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min
